net.sourceforge.taglets.simple
Interface DocletParameter

All Superinterfaces:
Parameter
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultDocletParameter
public interface DocletParameter
extends Parameter

Extended parameter object for SimpleTaglets.

In additional to the default Parameters the DocletParameter provides access to the current doclet Doc holder object that contains the tag processed.

Note:

To use in your SimpleTaglet simply test and cast the Parameter object passed in to DocletParameter.

Warning:

Using the DocletParameter introduces a dependency on the JavaDoc doclet API (i.e. include tools.jar).

Version:
1.5 (2008/03/30 12:43:13)
